text: This game is 10 years old now, which also means I haven't played a Pokemon game in 10 years. That's crazy, especially because of how big a fan I was during its first generation (Pokemon was basically my favorite thing ever from 1998 to 2000). I'll probably come back to it someday. I've always liked this theme, has a great waltz feel to it. Also the first game I played on my Gameboy Advance SP, the frontlit screen blew me away.
